welcome.description: Welcome to Miracle Center Church International Dortmund, a Spirit-filled community passionate about worship, prayer, and experiencing God’s power. We believe the same God who healed, delivered, and performed miracles in the Bible is still at work today, bringing restoration, healing, and renewed hope through faith and the Holy Spirit.

sunday-worship.title: Sunday Worship Service
sunday-worship.description: Experience a beautiful Sunday by praising and worshipping God with us at MCCI as a family. ‘Worship’ seasoned with the powerful and undeniable presence of the Holy Spirit and the life changing ‘Word’ is a wonderful way to begin your week. Meet and fellowship with other members of our Church and you will be amazed to find out how much you belong here. If you’ve never visited us before, we’d love to have you over!

prayer-service.title: Prayer Service
prayer-service.description: Experience the power of prayer at our Prayer Service at MCCI. As a family, we come together to lift our hearts to God, trusting Him to move in our lives. In this Spirit-filled atmosphere, peace is restored, burdens are lifted, and strength is renewed. Prayer not only draws us closer to God but also to one another. Whether it’s your first time or you’ve been before, we warmly welcome you come and see how prayer can transform your life!

good-morning-jesus.title: Good Morning Jesus
good-morning-jesus.description: Start your Saturday beautifully with Good Morning Jesus at MCCI. Join us as a family to greet the Lord through heartfelt prayer, uplifting worship, and the life giving Word. Filled with the presence of the Holy Spirit, mornings with Jesus bring peace, joy, and renewed strength for the week ahead. Meet and connect with other members of our Church you’ll be amazed at how much you belong here. If it’s your first time, we’d love to welcome you!

midnight-service.title: Midnight Service
midnight-service.description: Experience a powerful encounter with God at our Midnight Service at MCCI, held on the last Friday of every month. Join us as a family for worship, prayer, and the life changing Word in the presence of the Holy Spirit. This sacred time is perfect for reflection, renewal, and breakthroughs. Meet and fellowship with other members you’ll be amazed at how much you belong here. If it’s your first time, we’d love to welcome you!

church.title: We are not just a church but a family

series.title: Shape Your Life with the Words of Life

subscribe.text: Never miss a message. Subscribe to our YouTube and Podcast channels.

footer.description: MCCI is a church that believes in Jesus, a church that loves God and people.
